title: AMORE | translate Italian to English - Cambridge Dictionary
text: Translation of amore – Italian–English dictionary amore noun [ masculine ] /a'more/ ● (vicinanza) Synonym ● (tra due persone) Synonym fare l’amore / all’amore ● figurative (interesse) love , passion , enthusiasm amore per la poesia a love of poetry amore per gli animali a love of animals fare qlco con amore to do sth with love Synonym per amore di qlco for the sake of per amore della conversazione for the sake of the conversation ● teol. (di Dio) Per amore del cielo! For Heaven’s sake!
